name: Overall status
description: Returns `OK` if the Harbor API is reachable and answers correctly. Returns `CRITICAL` if the connection is not possible or if the API says the registry is unhealthy.

name: Status of the `Chartmuseum` service
description: Returns `OK` if the service is healthy, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`. This service check is not emitted unless the chartmuseum is configured.

name: Status of the `Registry` service
description: Returns `OK` if the service is healthy, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`. Only available with Harbor > 1.8.

name: Status of the `Redis` service
description: Returns `OK` if the service is healthy, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`. Only available with Harbor > 1.8.

name: Status of the `Jobservice` service
description: Returns `OK` if the service is healthy, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`. Only available with Harbor > 1.8.

name: Status of the `Registryctl` service
description: Returns `OK` if the service is healthy, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`. Only available with Harbor > 1.8.

name: Status of the `Portal` service
description: Returns `OK` if the service is healthy, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`. Only available with Harbor > 1.8.

name: Status of the `Core` service
description: Returns `OK` if the service is healthy, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`. Only available with Harbor > 1.8.

name: Status of the `Database` service
description: Returns `OK` if the service is healthy, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`. Only available with Harbor > 1.8.

name: External registries status
description: Returns `OK` if the service is healthy, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`. Monitors the health of external registries used by Harbor for replication.
